Reference

All functions

agePlotter()

Age plotter

cleaningY()

Regress out covariates

corner()

corner, an improved head()

edge.pvalue()

Function to compute empirical p-values

expression_cutoff()

Find expression cutoffs

getF()

Given two nested models, calculate the F-statistics

getOR()

Calculate the odds ratio

getPcaVars()

Calculates the percent of variance explained for principal components

getR2()

Calculate R squared from a matrix

getT()

Get t-statistics from limma objects

googledrive_csv()

Upload a CSV file to googledrive

granges_to_ucsc()

Convert a GRanges object to UCSC coordinates

junctionCount()

Count junctions

lab_presenters()

Randomize presenters and upload them to Google Drive

merge_rse_metrics()

Merge sample metadata across several columns

n_max() n_min()

Get more than just the single max or single min value with n_max() and n_min()

split0()

Splits into a list

ss()

Wrapper for string split and sapply

ucsc_to_granges()

Convert UCSC coordinates to a GRanges object
